select * from wms_inventory where (area_id, item_id) in
(#{it.areaId}, #{it.itemId})
and rack_id is null

select * from wms_inventory where (rack_id, item_id) in
(#{it.rackId}, #{it.itemId})

select * from wms_inventory where (warehouse_id, item_id) in
(#{it.warehouseId}, #{it.itemId})
and area_id is null and rack_id is null

select a.*, b.* from wms_inventory a left join wms_item b on a.item_id = b.id where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and
a.quantity < b.quantity

SELECT wi.* FROM wms_inventory wi LEFT JOIN wms_item ON wms_item.id = wi.item_id LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse ww ON wi.warehouse_id = ww.id LEFT JOIN wms_area wa ON wi.area_id = wa.id WHERE wi.del_flag = 0 AND wms_item.del_flag = 0 AND ww.del_flag = 0 AND (wa.del_flag = 0 OR wa.del_flag IS NULL);

select i.* from wms_inventory i left join wms_warehouse w on w.id = i.warehouse_id left join wms_rack r on r.id = i.rack_id left join wms_area a on a.id = i.area_id where i.item_id = #{itemId} and i.del_flag = 0 and i.quantity > 0 and (i.rack_id != '' and i.rack_id is not null and r.del_flag = 0 or i.rack_id is null) and (i.warehouse_id != '' and i.warehouse_id is not null and w.del_flag = 0 or i.warehouse_id is null) and (i.area_id != '' and i.area_id is not null and a.del_flag = 0 or i.area_id is null) order by i.quantity ${sort}
